# The `AMDGPUPerfHintAnalysis.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Analyzes if a function potentially memory bound and if a kernel kernel may benefit from limiting number of waves to reduce cache thrashing. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Analyzes if a function potentially memory bound and if a kernel kernel may benefit from limiting number of waves to reduce cache thrashing.
